name: Asteriods-1980
description:
A game that's available for Mac and Linux. Here are some of the characteristics of the game-

  1. Circular asteroids(sorry ) :(  .
  2. Real-life physics for movement(arrow keys, I hate WASD).
  3. Realistic acceleration.
  4. You can't get out(sorry too).
  5. 3 Lives.
  6. Score added by ten every time you shoot an asteroid.
  7. When you destroy every asteroid you move to the next level.

I take criticism well, so you can tell me the defects or the bugs.
